title: Should I get placed this season?
body:
So I have around ~15 days to get placed before the season ends and I debating if I should even bother.

I'm currently 1-1 with placements (plus a dodge which counts as a loss), so the highest I would initially be placed in is low Gold.

I don't want anything less than a Diamond badge, but I don't think I have enough time to grind through all the promos.

So should I get placed and have the chance of being stuck with a shitter badge, or should I just wait out this season?
